Son requires standing fan to alleviate the heat and to create a cooler environment for his studying and resting. Son has skin condition that will trigger and cause bleeding when scratched.

name: Sofa
description:
Client is a family of four who are in need of a sofa for their home, especially with Hari Raya approaching. Currently, there is no proper seating for family members to gather and sit comfortably. Family is facing financial difficulties.
The father has recently become unemployed, and the mother is unable to work due to full-time caregiving responsibilities. In addition, the client’s elderly father, who occasionally assists with caregiving, has existing health conditions and requires proper seating support. A sofa would greatly improve the family’s comfort and well-being during daily activities and family gatherings. We kindly request the donor’s assistance in providing the sofa and covering the delivery cost, as the family is unable to afford these expenses at this time.

Thank you for your kind consideration and support.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Rachel Toh

name: Wheelchair
description:
Mr Zul lives with his spouse in a 2 room rental flat. Mr Zul has visual impairment and is wheelchair bound. 

The wheelchair that Mr Zul purchased from carousell a few years ago had spoilt, putting him in a safety risk. 

A new wheelchair would help him to regain his mobility in a safe manner, so that his spouse would also be able to wheel him with confidence. 

If there are any leads, feel free to contact me, Sabrina at 82922208. thank u!

name: Bicycle
description:
Sunbeam Place @ Children’s Society is requesting 2 medium-sized bicycles suitable for children aged 10 years and above.
These bicycles will be used to teach residents how to ride and for their general use.

Delivery will need to be arranged by the kind donor.
If you wish to contribute, please click “Donate”, and we will get in touch with you soon.

We sincerely thank you for your kindness and generosity in advance.
